content: Just FYI, but it looks like the Netherlands has an effort to specify how to submit vitals from a PHR. MedMij FHIR Implementation Guide Vital Signs 2.0.11

The #finnish PHR is also all about citizens writing their own health and wellness data into a FHIR based PHR. See https://www.kanta.fi/en/system-developers/kanta-phr. And https://simplifier.net/organization/kanta/~projects.
